document_data.caption: ''Zark the Dwarf.''
document_data.name: Zark
document_data.text: ''This young dwarf wears black leathers, sports several tattoos, and wears a belt ostentatiously set with several silver-hilted daggers.''
document_data.Personality: Zark was a greedy freeloader and slaver.
document_data.Possessions: In battle, Zark wore [[leather armor]] and fought with a [[warhammer]].
